_header: I have been both far and near
_description: A good cheer poem — one quatrain

EDU202.Transcription:
I hayf beyn bath fere & neyreAnd seyn both Joy &
                    JoylyteTo serf god & mak gud cherethe lays I halde Bot
                    Wanyte
EDU202.Note:
Added by sixteenth-century hand to front flyleaf with other pentrials; a
                    second copy, still more obliterated, below this one.
